comments.text:
Created attachment 564226
Screencap.png

User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 5.1; rv:10.0a1) Gecko/20111002 Firefox/10.0a1
Build ID: 20111002030844

Steps to reproduce:

1. Make sure that you have a title bar (i.e. show the menu bar)
2. Go to http://french.stackexchange.com/q/120/82
3. See the poor rendering of the narrow non-breaking spaces, after « and before »


Actual results:

The narrow non-breaking spaces are rendered as squares, aka unknown character.
